ProductInfo.Features:
Professional 4 Channel DVR with 2 x 1/3" SONY CCD Cameras, 600 TV lines & Wide Dynamic Range. iPhone, Android, and VGA support, Real Time Video/Audio Recording, Playback and Network capability, Network Video Monitor System browsing, PTZ Control.
DVR feature: Support Phones with iPhone, Android, Windows Mobile, and Symbian     VGA support     IE or NVMS software (Network Video Monitor System) browsing     PELCO-P ,PELCO-D, Samsung, Panasonic     Manual/schedule/Motion Detection Recording Modes     Time & date search easy access     Live monitoring through internet from anywhere     Easy navigation
GW733H: Professional Waterproof Outdoor Day & Night camera, 1/3" SONY CCD, 600 TV lines. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Low Illumination 0 Lux (with IR LED on).
Camera feature: 1/3" SONY CCD camera     600 TV lines     Super low lux 0 Lux minimum illumination     WDR (Wide Dynamic Range)     OSD Menu     Auto Gain Control     Auto Electronic Shutter
